name: PHANTOM MISSION
description:
PHANTOM MISSION Is a 2D Sidescroller Stealth game, with a focus on getting past enemies without being detected. 

Gameplay is tactical and strategic. Run'N'Shoot will not work, use your tools designed to avoid detection and successfully infiltrate this mysterious base that's ran only by machines.

Your objective is simple, infiltrate the base and steal a prototype Time warp machine, remember what you went through.

inspired by games as Metal Gear Solid and Mark of the Ninja

Development time: 1 Month (Disclaimer: Bugs are expected to appear, while I've done what I could and also being the first time I work on something this different some stuff are bound to break) * Made for a College Work
